Haste
When Hakurei Ancestor enters, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
{2}{R}{W}: Exile Hakurei Ancestor. At the beginning of the next combat, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: [i]“The true form of Fantasy Nature is ‘disappearance'. Isn't this what I taught you, Reimu?”[/i]
